summary:
Bound Weapons are now craftable!
Craftable at a forge, Upgradable, and will -not- disappear from your inventory when sheathed.
Why yes, you can use them while mounted.
UPDATE: Dragonborn edition added, can now craft a Unbound Dagger
descriptionHtml:
Its finally here!
Bound Weapons, fully craftable, and upgradable

They are not as hard hitting as a Daedric weapon, but to make up for that, they strike faster, and have a really cool appear in hand effect/fade away with sheathed effect, and they will -not- be lost when sheathed.
They are also stronger than a normal bound weapon. However, they are not enchantable, because the whole bound weapon effect firey-effect thingy that bound weapons have is actually an enchantment itself, meaning you can disenchant these and apply them to other weapons.

Warning: When sheathed, the bound weapon will seem as if it disapears, that is because the weapon itself has no actual mesh, and the bound enchantment actually gives it its shape or form, please remember, the weapon is still there, and the weapon will reappear when you unsheathe.

==Crafting Instructions==

-Daedric smithing is no longer required to craft this, but Arcane Smithing (or w/e its called) is required to upgrade


Bound Sword - Unbound:
-Requires (crafting): Spell Tome: Bound Sword, Daedra Heart
-Upgrading: 1 Ebony Ingot

Bound Bow - Unbound:
-Requires (crafting): Spell Tome: Bound Bow, Daedra Heart
-Upgrading: 1 Ebony Ingot

Bound Battleaxe - Unbound:
-Requires (crafting): Spell Tome: Bound Battleaxe, Daedra Heart
-Upgrading: 1 Ebony Ingot

Bound Arrow - Unbound
-Requires (crafting): Daedra Heart, Grand Soul Gem, Firewood
-Creates 50 Arrows!

[Dragonborn Version Only!] 

Bound Dagger - Unbound:
-Requires (crafting): Daedra Heart, Spell Tome: Bound Dagger
-Upgrading: 1 Ebony Ingot



==Changelog==

v1.0: Base Version
- Started Mod
- Bound Weapons, No Arrows, No Dragonborn Version

v2.0

- Daedric smithing requirement removed!
- Bound Arrow Crafting added
- Mistake with the Bound Battleaxe name fixed
- Added Dragonborn Version
- Dragonborn Version: Has everything Normal v2.0 has, but allows crafting of a Bound Dagger

v2.1 DB (Only Affecting Dragonborn Version)

- Fixed a problem with the Unbound Dagger not appearing in inventory.



==Requirements==
- Only the Dragonborn version requires the Dragonborn DLC

== Incompatible with==
-As far as I know, I have seen no conflicts with other mods whatsoever, but if you find one, please be so kind as to tell me :P

==How to Install==
-As always, just drop that little esp friend of ours into the Data folder where you keep all the other esps and you are set!
author: psychomanP33
